attributes.action: guarantee that any money raised from the proposed sea angling (boat and beach) licence fee is ringfenced for use in improving facilities for sea anglers around the coast of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too often this government imposes levies and then merely absorbs the money into general funding thereby making it yet another stealth tax.  The people of this country need to have a say in what happens to money taken in for specific purposes.  Such money should not merely be handed over to politicians with their own agenda who will use it for their own aggrandisement.
